titleStmt.title: The complaint of the shepheard Harpalus To a pleasant new tune.
titleStmt.author: Murray, David, Sir, 1567-1629.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the assignes of Thomas Symcocke,

notesStmt.note: Signed: D.M., i.e. Sir David Murray.
Another edition of STC 18295.4, published in 1625.
Issued with STC 15.5: The tragedie of Phillis (1628-1629).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
